thread.title: Ashleigh Brewer films The Bold And The Beautiful in Sydney | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ashleigh Brewer films The Bold And The Beautiful in Sydney | Daily Mail Online

author: Simone Amelia For Daily Mail Australia
title: Ashleigh Brewer films The Bold And The Beautiful in Sydney | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 120 shares She wore her long hair out in waves, with drop earrings and designer shades to complete the look. At one point she moved away from the group to take a photo of the scenery surrounding her on Sydney Harbour. Picturesque: At one point she moved away from the group to take a photo of the scenery surrounding her on Sydney Harbour Stunning: The brunette beauty stood out in a floral mini-shorts and a lilac off-shoulder top paired with beige stilettos and a matching purse She then headed back to join the crew, which included fellow actors, makeup artists, sound operators and cameramen. They took a break from filming on the famous Opera House stairs and a number of the cast mates, Ashleigh included, held their scripts in their hand as they walked. The Bold And The Beautiful will mark its 30th year of broadcasting in coming months. Team work: She then headed back to join the crew, which included fellow actors, makeup artists, sound operators and cameramen Lights camera action: They took a break from filming on the famous Opera House stairs and a number of the cast mates, Ashleigh included, held their scripts in their hand as they walked Ashleigh's character, Ivy Forrester, debuted in July 2014 as the niece of Eric Forrester, played by veteran star John McCook. The Brisbane-born actress has a three-year contract with the show, having left Neighbours after a five-year run playing Kate Ramsay in November 2013. Prior to her decision to quit Neighbours, she celebrated filming 1000 episodes in July that year. Knockout: Ashleigh's character, Ivy Forrester, debuted in July 2014 as the niece of Eric Forrester, played by veteran star John McCook Share or comment on this article 120
